text: Vaira Vīķe-Freiberga (born 1 December 1937) is a Latvian politician. She was the sixth President of Latvia and the first female President of Latvia. She was elected President of Latvia in 1999 and re-elected for the second term in 2003. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Latvia Category:University of Toronto alumni
title: Vaira Vīķe-Freiberga
